translations: 瘟疫（尤指鼠疫）；有害的事物

sentences.sentence: In recent months the city has revived its efforts to curb honking, smoking and the pestilence of plastic bags.
sentences.translation: 最近几个月来，这个城市重振旗鼓，再次禁止鸣笛，禁烟，以及禁止到处都是的塑料袋。

sentences.sentence: For plague and pestilence, plunder and pollution, the hazards of nature and the hunger of children are the foes of every nation.
sentences.translation: 因为传染病与流行病，劫掠与污染，自然灾害与受饥饿的儿童是我们每一个国家的仇敌。

sentences.sentence: So will I send upon you famine and evil beasts, and they shall bereave thee; and pestilence and blood shall pass through thee; and I will bring the sword upon thee.
sentences.translation: 又要使饥荒和恶兽到你那里，叫你丧子，瘟疫和流血的事也必盛行在你那里。我也要使刀剑临到你。
